description: Web Development is the process of creating and maintaining websites. It encompasses a wide range of skills, including HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and web design. Web developers are in high demand, as businesses increasingly rely on the internet to reach customers and conduct business.

Java is a general-purpose programming language that is widely used for developing applications for a wide range of platforms, including desktops, servers, and mobile devices. Java is known for its portability, platform independence, and object-oriented programming paradigm.
Software Engineering is the application of engineering principles to the design, development, testing, and deployment of software systems.

Technology is the application of scientific knowledge for practical purposes, or to change and manipulate the physical world. Technology encompasses a vast range of fields, including computers, electronics, telecommunications, and transportation. Technology has played a major role in shaping modern society, and it continues to evolve at a rapid pace.
